title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 05
author: Various
snippet: Ever after this adventure, I was a welcomevisitant at Locherben; and Nanny Telfer who is now the mistress of alarge family, and has servants of her own, patronises me to a veryconsiderable extent.
